line_1: And gently strikes the sympathetic chords,
line_2: Friendship her soft harmonious touch affords,
And drew a tone from weakest words;

line_1: Bending as he swept the chords
The Lesbian patriot smites the sounding chords:
line_2: Devoting shame and vengeance to her lords

line_1: Soft Sighs responsive whisper to the chords,
The master of the tuneful chords;
line_2: Thus in gay notes, and boastful words,
